title: FSA Student Aid Estimator - User Data
description: User data required to execute the FSA Student Aid Estimator and calculate federal student aid eligibility

state.description: Student's state of legal residence (full name, e.g., 'Illinois')

grade_level.description: Student's grade level for the 2026-27 school year

has_dependents.description: Does the student have children or other dependents they support?

circumstance_active_duty.description: Is the student currently serving on active duty as a veteran of the U.S. armed forces?

circumstance_orphan.description: At any time since age 13, was the student an orphan?

circumstance_foster_care.description: At any time since age 13, was the student in foster care or a ward of the court?

circumstance_emancipated.description: Is or was the student a legally emancipated minor or in legal guardianship?

circumstance_homeless.description: Is the student unaccompanied and homeless?

circumstance_none.description: None of the special circumstances apply to the student

parent_state.description: Parent's state of residence (full name, e.g., 'Illinois')

family_size.description: Number of people in the student's family, including the student

parent_filed_taxes.description: Did the student's parent file taxes in 2024?

parent_income.description: Parent's adjusted gross income from 2024 taxes (in dollars). Required if parent filed taxes.

parent_assets.description: Parent's total assets including cash, savings, checking accounts, businesses/farms, and real estate (excluding primary home) in dollars. Required if parent filed taxes.

parent_child_support.description: Annual child support received by parent in the last complete calendar year (in dollars). Enter 0 if none. Required if parent filed taxes.

student_filed_taxes.description: Did the student file taxes in 2024?

student_income.description: Student's adjusted gross income from 2024 taxes (in dollars). Required only if student filed taxes.

student_assets.description: Student's total assets (in dollars). Required only if student filed taxes.
